Package org.jnativehook.mouse

Interface Summary
NativeMouseInputListener A listener implementing all the methods in both the NativeMouseListener and NativeMouseMotionListener interfaces.
NativeMouseListener The listener interface for receiving systemwide NativeMouseEvents.
NativeMouseMotionListener The listener interface for receiving native mouse motion events.
 

Class Summary
NativeMouseEvent An event which indicates that a mouse action occurred on the system.
 

Exception Summary
NativeMouseException Signals that a Native Mouse Exception has occurred.
